original_text:
Therefore the showers have been withheld,
    and no spring rains have fallen.
Yet you have the brazen look of a prostitute;
    you refuse to blush with shame.
korean_text: 그러므로 단비가 그쳤고 늦은 비가 없어졌느니라 그럴지라도 네가 창녀의 낯을 가졌으므로 수치를 알지 못하느니라

sentences.original_text: Therefore the showers have been withheld
and no spring rains have fallen
Yet you have the brazen look of a prostitute
sentences.korean_translation: 그럼에도 너는 창녀의 뻔뻔한 얼굴을 하고 있으며

sentences.original_text: you refuse to blush with shame
